type: “And if your eye causes you to stumble, gouge it out and throw it away. It is better for you to enter life with one eye than to have two eyes and be thrown into the fire of hell”. Matthew 18:9
created_at:
Let’s pray:
Dear Lord, it is my desire that my whole spirit, soul and body are committed to you only. Aloud my eyes see your light, grace and mercy.
company:
By Wilson Morán
Traslated by Luis Luna Jr
title: Not a thing of the past
description: The young lady who watches porn. I had grown up in a conservative and devoted Christian home, attended a Christian church, was an outstanding student, perfect daughter, active member in the youth ministry… and had an addiction to pornography. I looked over for help, but couldn’t find anything for women. Everything was focus on men. I thought I was the only girl struggling with this issue. Whatever you’ve done in the past, or whatever you’re doing in the present, it is not beyond the reach of God’s grace and love. It is not beyond the cross. You’ve not sinned beyond the cross. God’s love for you is real.
